analysis.description:
Crowdsale.hasBalance (/unique_chucks/4/0xaaf4281fd8142dc3263b3303b0a6f62d00b2d07e.sol#602-613) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- allocatedIndex[_beneficiary].length > 0 && _releaseDate == allocatedIndex[_beneficiary][allocated[_beneficiary][_releaseDate].index]

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.endCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/4/0xaaf4281fd8142dc3263b3303b0a6f62d00b2d07e.sol#766-797):
	External calls:
	- ! token.unlock() (/unique_chucks/4/0xaaf4281fd8142dc3263b3303b0a6f62d00b2d07e.sol#776)
	- totalTokenSupply = token.totalSupply() + allocatedTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0xaaf4281fd8142dc3263b3303b0a6f62d00b2d07e.sol#778-779)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allocatedTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0xaaf4281fd8142dc3263b3303b0a6f62d00b2d07e.sol#785-789)

GLACrowdsale.retreiveTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0xaaf4281fd8142dc3263b3303b0a6f62d00b2d07e.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenInstance.transfer(beneficiary,tokenBalance) (/unique_chucks/4/0xaaf4281fd8142dc3263b3303b0a6f62d00b2d07e.sol)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.endCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/4/0xaaf4281fd8142dc3263b3303b0a6f62d00b2d07e.sol#766-797):
	External calls:
	- ! token.unlock() (/unique_chucks/4/0xaaf4281fd8142dc3263b3303b0a6f62d00b2d07e.sol#776)
	- totalTokenSupply = token.totalSupply() + allocatedTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0xaaf4281fd8142dc3263b3303b0a6f62d00b2d07e.sol#778-779)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allocated (/unique_chucks/4/0xaaf4281fd8142dc3263b3303b0a6f62d00b2d07e.sol#785-789)
	- allocated (/unique_chucks/4/0xaaf4281fd8142dc3263b3303b0a6f62d00b2d07e.sol#795-797)
	- allocatedEth (/unique_chucks/4/0xaaf4281fd8142dc3263b3303b0a6f62d00b2d07e.sol#795-797)
	- allocatedIndex (/unique_chucks/4/0xaaf4281fd8142dc3263b3303b0a6f62d00b2d07e.sol#785-789)
	- allocatedIndex (/unique_chucks/4/0xaaf4281fd8142dc3263b3303b0a6f62d00b2d07e.sol#795-797)

Reentrancy in GLACrowdsale.importPresaleContribution (/unique_chucks/4/0xaaf4281fd8142dc3263b3303b0a6f62d00b2d07e.sol#1136-1145):
	External calls:
	- distributedPresaleTokens = presaleToken.balanceOf(_contributor) (/unique_chucks/4/0xaaf4281fd8142dc3263b3303b0a6f62d00b2d07e.sol#1142-1145)
	- allocatedPresaleTokens = presale.balanceOf(_contributor) (/unique_chucks/4/0xaaf4281fd8142dc3263b3303b0a6f62d00b2d07e.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allocated (/unique_chucks/4/0xaaf4281fd8142dc3263b3303b0a6f62d00b2d07e.sol)
	- allocatedIndex (/unique_chucks/4/0xaaf4281fd8142dc3263b3303b0a6f62d00b2d07e.sol)
	- allocatedTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0xaaf4281fd8142dc3263b3303b0a6f62d00b2d07e.sol)
